bug.author: fepegar
bug.summary: RandomElasticDeformation uses same interpolation for all images
bug.description: 🐛Bug Nearest neighbor interpolation should be applied by default to label images, as in the other spatial transforms. Related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fepegar/torchio/issues/288>#288</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: This is actully not true. Nearest neighbor interpolation is indeed applied by default to label images.
